item.description:
We will continue to work our way through the lessons and discuss other topics related to the text. We are currently working on lessons 83-86.

Please arrive 10-15 minutes early so that we can catch up with one another, pour a cup of tea, and get started with our brief silent meditation when the group is scheduled to start.

If you are running late, please feel free to come in whenever you arrive.

You can find the complete Course in Miracles on line at a variety of websites. The most common edition is found at www.acim.org. We have extra copies if you don't have your own.

"My only function is the one God gave me... My function and my happiness are one." Lesson 83

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Discussion Group
